title: Ring of Fire: The Emile Griffith Story (2005) boxing documentary
description:
Ring of Fire: The Emile Griffith Story (2005 - USA)

Documentary
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0436720/


Sundance Film Festival - NOMINATED - Grand Jury Prize

Dan Klores and Ron Berger's documentary charts the rise and fall of former welterweight boxing champ Emile Griffith. Born in the Virgin Islands, Griffith moved to New York where, before becoming a boxer, he designed ladies' hats. Once inside the ring his career took off and regular boxing telecasts made him a celebrity. In a 1962 match, Griffith beat Benny "Kid" Paret to death. Griffith's star faded and the incident ended boxing broadcasts.


Video: XviD, 592x336, 29.970 fps, 977 Kbps, 01h27m33s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
